data.eml:eml: Inconvenient hyperdiversity - the traditional concept of “ PheIdole pallIdula ” includes four cryptic species (Hymenoptera: Formicidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bernhard Seifert (2016): Inconvenient hyperdiversity - the traditional concept of “ PheIdole pallIdula ” includes four cryptic species (Hymenoptera: Formicidae). Soil Organisms 88 (1): 1-18, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.270253
